snippet: A semiofficial campaign has gathered steam to question Japanese rule over the Ryukyu chain, including the strategic island that is home to 27,000 American troops.
abstract: Semiofficial campaign in China questioning Japan's sovereignty over its southernmost island chain has begun gathering steam; chain includes Okinawa, home to 1.3 million Japanese citizens and 27,000 American troops; goal of campaign may be to strengthen China's claim to group of islands in East China Sea.
lead_paragraph: A semiofficial campaign has gathered steam to question Japanese rule over the Ryukyu chain, including the strategic island that is home to 27,000 American troops.

headline.main: Calls Grow in China to Press Claim for Okinawa
headline.print_headline: Calls Grow in China to Press Claim for Okinawa
